caption: Table 1: Comparison of different representations for 3D generation.
description: This table compares various 3D representation methods used in 3D generation, highlighting their capabilities in precise mesh extraction, ease of convergence during optimization, and real-time rendering performance.  It also lists representative methods that utilize each representation type.

caption: Table 1: Comparison of different representations for 3D generation.
description: The table compares different 3D representations used in 3D generation, including NeRF, 3DGS, DMTet, and the proposed TeT-Splatting method.  It assesses each method across four key criteria: precise mesh extraction, ease of convergence during optimization, real-time rendering capability, and the representative method used in various prior works.
